body.name: Sunzel Butterflycra Workout Leggings for Women with Hidden Scrunch, High Waist Butt Lifting Gym Yoga Pants with Tummy Control
features: 【Ultimate Comfort & Flexibility】Crafted with a premium nylon blend, these no front seam leggings offer a lightweight, buttery soft, and smooth feel against your skin. They provide just the right level of compression for optimum comfort during your fitness routines.

【Hidden Scrunch Design】These Workout Leggings feature an innovative hidden scrunch design. The elastic in the back rise seam subtly enhances your glutes, providing the perfect shape without obvious scrunching - a flattering and comfortable fit for your workout.
【Booty Accentuating Stitching】Our scrunch butt leggings feature a distinctive V contour stitching to accentuate your curves, enhancing your natural shape while providing an optimal fit.

【Optimal Compression】With their excellent compression, these sweat wicking leggings offer support where you need it most, reducing muscle fatigue and improving your performance during workouts, yoga, or any intense physical activities.

【Versatile & Stylish】The simplicity and elegance of these tights make them not only a great choice for workouts but also a fashionable piece for casual wear. Pair them with your favorite sportswear or casual tops for a stylish look.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #360 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #8 in Women's Activewear Leggings #13 in Women's Yoga Leggings

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sunzel Flattering Butt Lift: Our leggings are crafted to enhance and contour the buttock area perfectly. The hidden scrunch design not only gives your rear a lifted and fuller look but also boosts confidence during workouts, making you feel as good as you look. Sunzel High-Waisted with Tummy Control Rise and shine with our high-waisted design that seamlessly hugs your midsection. Offering superior tummy control, our leggings provide an enhanced silhouette while ensuring maximum comfort during any activity. Sunzel Squat-Proof Design With our Hidden Scrunch Leggings, fitness enthusiasts can enjoy their workout sessions without any worries. Its secure construction ensures no embarrassing see-through moments, allowing you to squat and stretch with complete confidence. Sunzel Exceptional Elasticity & Comfort Experience a blend of flexibility and softness like no other. Our Hidden Scrunch Leggings offer remarkable stretch, ensuring a snug fit. Coupled with its soft texture, it promises a skin-friendly touch, making it your go-to for both strenuous workouts and relaxing sessions. Sunzel Buttery Soft Touch & No Front Seam Sunzel leggings offer a buttery soft touch that feels like a second skin. Seamlessly designed, they provide an impeccable fit that enhances your natural curves without the discomfort of front seams. Sunzel Stay Cool, Dry, And Confident With Our Moisture-Wicking, Breathable Perfection Elevate your workout with Sunzel's Gym Leggings. Experience peak performance with exceptional moisture-wicking, ensuring comfort during intense sessions. Stay cool in the heat with remarkable breathability. Unite moisture control and airflow for your best workout yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality & fit!
reviews.reviewText: The color and fit of these is amazing, so buttery soft but stays in place and doesn’t ride down. Has a subtle butt scrunch & Makes the body look so good. Can’t say enough good things, definately getting every color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most buttery leggings!
reviews.reviewText: I love these leggings. They are super buttery and the hidden scrunch is my favorite. These fit true to size although i should have gotten a medium, but sized down to a small and they still fit great with just a big of a tighter compression. The color looks just like the picture and they are for sure squat proof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s not easy to find a pair of leggings for a tall person. Love that these have the 28” inseam option, just wish there were more color options in that size. I bought a medium and large and even though the large was very tight it kept slipping down. The medium fits tight and stays in place, so I would say these are very true to size. Don’t size up. I like the hidden scrunch because honestly the butt crack leggings are so tacky. The only thing I don’t like is that these leggings seem to flatten my butt down a little. So they’re obviously very supportive. I can tell this material will get pulls easily so I wouldn’t use any Velcro around them. It’s not really a high end material but it is very soft and cozy. I could work out in these or take a nap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfiest leggings I own!
reviews.reviewText: These are buttery soft and absolutely perfect for traveling, working out, or as an everyday legging. They give you that lifted look, but not over the top - it's very natural. They are a bit thinner than I expected, but they aren't sheer or see-through even in bright lighting. The thinner feel allows you to move around comfortably without the band digging into the stomach. I will 100% be buying another pair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best seemless leggings!
reviews.reviewText: These leggings are so comfortable and soft! The butt scrunch does not ride up the bits, and the fit is phenomenal. I have looked for years for comfortable, seemless leggings that don’t break the bank and these are it. Highly recommend. I’m 140 with wider hips than most, and I ordered a medium.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have never left a review but I had to with these because they are great.. I had purchased paragon leggings, and they were terrible compared to these... these don't fall down when you're working out and then make your butt look pretty nice and they're super soft.. there's only one downfall is they collect lint really bad 🤪 I just have a lint roller in my car lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They fall down.
reviews.reviewText: The material is super soft and lovely. But the fit does not work. They slide down make your butt look unflattering. The hidden scrunch doesn’t work either. The lilac color highlight any sort of cellulite you may have. Got so frustrated with them I threw them away when I should have gotten my money back. I may do that with the black pair I own. The light color also makes any pilling that happens because of the soft material super noticeable. The flare leggings of this same brand are a different texture, silky spandex cool to the touch but they are so much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super soft but pills.
reviews.reviewText: The design of the leggings are flattering and the fabric is buttery soft but I noticed so pilling after one wear. I know these aren’t super expensive but they aren’t super cheap either. Wish the fabric was a better quality.

It has been so hard for me to find a good pair of leggings that fit right. These are 100% the perfect fit. They are so comfortable as soon as I had one leg through I always yelling out to my husband how soft and comfy they are! I will definitely be ordering another pair..or two lol

These are my new favourite leggings. They’re really soft and the high waist is just right for my height. I’m 5’4 and sometimes high waisted leggings are too high. These are just right. And also don’t dig in. I’m pretty active in the gym and these pass the squat test. Also they’re incredibly soft and have a good stretch so makes them super comfortable. From gym to running errands, I’ll def be choosing these first!

reviews.reviewTitle: What are those even made of? Oh god. So gooooooooooooood.
reviews.reviewText: It is really soft and comfy while still being compressed. It fits you really nicely around the waist giving you a more toned and beautiful look.Just love them!

I bought these to compare them to my all time favorite gymshark WS leggings, no front seam and hidden butt scrunch.I'm 5'5, 131lbs, 27.5" waist, 37" butt, 22" thighs, and I purchased a size M. I also wear size M in gymshark. I have a short torso and these hit me just below the belly button, they could be an inch or two higher. They were compressive in the legs and butt but could be tighter in the waist. Unfortunately they kept sliding down the first time I wore them at the gym, I was constantly pulling them up, but I think a size small would be too tight. They do however make my bum look amazing, and I will probably try another color. I got black and they were squat proof.
Honestly they are great for the money. Thin material; but comfy, stretchy, & soft. Would definitely buy again and recommend. 👌🏼
